channel.title: Take Down Downloads That You Can not Download
channel.description:
Hi there i was wondering if there is ANY way you can take down Downloads that you can NOT download anymore.. Because its getting very annoying clicking a link, spending time reading it, Then click the link for it, And its been removed.
Please get back on this because it is getting Annoying!

item.title: Take Down Downloads That You Can not Download
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

There is currently 347+ pages and counting. Are you willing to go through each threads + user posts and give us each thread that needs “taking down”?

I’m 100% certain if you can do that, you would also be able take action on each thread after a very sad person as double checked each one.

If you’re smart enough maybe you can make a script to save the trouble but I’m sure if you could do that you would “maybe” not be leech from the download section but fact that you are

^ That’s what I think

Read full topic
item.source: Take Down Downloads That You Can not Download

item.title: Take Down Downloads That You Can not Download
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Si, if a topic was specifically reported using the Report to moderator feature, would any action be taken?

Read full topic

item.title: Take Down Downloads That You Can not Download
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

That’d be a waste of man power and would be very time consuming on the moderators part. That’ll have to remain the responsibility of the person who releases the server.

Read full topic
item.source: Take Down Downloads That You Can not Download

item.title: Take Down Downloads That You Can not Download
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

If you don’t look at threads that are a year old or more then you shouldn’t have any problems with removed links.

Read full topic
item.source: Take Down Downloads That You Can not Download

item.title: Take Down Downloads That You Can not Download
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

That would take far too much time for mods, a waste of time really. Next time, before reading all of the topic, check the links first and if they work continue on reading. It is the simplest solution for everyone, and it really isn’t that much effort to achieve your end result.

Read full topic
